code: import React,{useCallback,useEffect,useMemo,useState}from'react';import PotterApi from'../services/booksApi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=()=>{const potterService=useMemo(()=>new PotterApi(),[]);const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const handleGetBooks=useCallback(async()=>{const response=await potterService.getBooks();const listBooks=response.map(item=>{return{title:item.title,id:item.number,author:item.author};});setBooks(listBooks);},[]);useEffect(()=>{handleGetBooks();},[handleGetBooks]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Lista de Livros"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:book.title})," - ",book.author," (",book.year,")"]},book.id))})]});};export default BookList;
